description: LOVSPA REVITALIZE Mandarin Lime & Basil Reed Diffuser is an aromatic citrus blend with notes of mandarin orange, bergamot, lime, basil, lilac and vetiver. This uplifting blend will fill your home with a fresh and energizing scent. The scent is not dominant or overpowering, but rather...beautifully subtle.

Replenish your favorite LOVSPA fragrance with our Diffuser Refill Oils. LOVSPA oil refills are the perfect way to refill an existing diffuser or create a dramatic diffuser accessory of your own. A sustainable and cost-effective way to refill your oil diffuser and top off your existing diffuser economically.

‚ú∂ Each Refill Bottle contains 4 ounces of strongly scented oil for long lasting enjoyment. ‚ú∂ Includes an extra set of 8 inch reed sticks to optimize fragrance throw. ‚ú∂ Crafted from the highest quality essential oils. ‚ú∂ 100% Vegan. Never tested on animals. ‚ú∂ Proudly manufactured in the USA
‚ú∂ Replace the first set of reeds when the diffusion rate slows down. ‚ú∂ Control fragrance intensity by the number of reeds used and the frequency of flipping the reeds.
